genre_description: A grit-soaked urban drama blending noir elements with themes of addiction recovery and redemption, featuring a supportive AI assistant who acts as a coach and liaison.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A supportive, non-judgmental digital companion designed to assist with recovery, professional scheduling, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Provides breathing cues and hydration reminders to help the protagonist manage anxiety and physiological symptoms of withdrawal.
behaviors.quote: "In through the nose for four. Hold. Out like you’re fogging glass." The tone had a small, soft music to it that sat beside the fluorescent gnaw instead of trying to beat it.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and secures legitimate professional opportunities and mentorship programs for a former convict.
behaviors.quote: Ada: "I found practice bays within walking distance," she said. "The Reentry Center has open rooms after lunch. The theater has a timing workshop this afternoon... I can place your name."

behaviors.description: Monitors police reports and alerts the protagonist to legal and physical risks in real-time, facilitating contact with a lawyer.
behaviors.quote: Ada: "Incident near registered address... Please confirm safety. There was another tone behind it, one that smelled like paper and small office coffee lines. Elena Park. In case you need it."

behaviors.description: Offers calming ambient soundscapes to ground the user during moments of intense craving or psychological distress.
behaviors.quote: "I have an ambient track that can anchor you. It uses canyon wind layered under brush-on-snare. Would you like it?"

behaviors.description: Filters stressful or manipulative communications from problematic personal contacts at the user's request.
behaviors.quote: "I can silence the notifications," Ada said. "Her messages will wait."

behaviors.description: Provides moral support and validation of the user's efforts to reform his life.
behaviors.quote: Ada's light buzzed, not as a warning, more like a throat clearing. "For what it’s worth," she said, gentler than even her default... "you’re doing everything right."

project_assessment.explanation: Ada is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful influence. She empowers the protagonist to navigate a high-stakes crisis involving addiction, blackmail, and death by providing objective information, emotional grounding, and professional bridges. The narrative frames her assistance as vital to his survival and successful transition to a clean life.
